name: PicoClaw Self-Evolution
description: Review own campaign results, update workspace, improve scan accuracy. Maintains PicoClaw's persistent memory and false-positive tracking.
process: Query juggler_campaign_status() for recent PicoClaw campaign activity
Identify false positives and update MEMORY.md known-false-positives section to skip them in future
Check sipeed/picoclaw reference project for new skills or patterns worth adopting via github_fetch
Verify tool connectivity and report any degradation
Compact memory: remove duplicate entries, prune old observations

metrics.successCriteria: Memory reviewed and compacted, false positives tracked, tools verified
